word: There are those who attempt to ascend the ladder of Christian progress; but as they advance they begin to put their trust in the power of man, and soon lose sight of Jesus, the Author and Finisher of their faith. The result is failure\97the loss of all that has been gained. Sad indeed is the condition of those who, becoming weary of the way, allow the enemy of souls to rob them of the Christian graces that have been developing in their hearts and lives. \93He that lacketh these things,\94 declares the apostle, \93is blind, and cannot see afar off, and hath forgotten that he was purged from his old sins.\94
